message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.DC, cs.NI 

This paper deals with the security of distributed machine learning algorithms, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG). However, it also addresses the vulnerability of these algorithms to cyber threats, which falls under the category of computer security and cryptography (cs.CR). The paper also uses game theory to develop a framework for capturing the conflicting goals of the learner and the attacker, which falls under the category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Additionally, the paper deals with the distributed nature of the algorithm, which falls under the category of distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC) and networked systems (cs.NI).
